posts.post_content:
The following postcard are available for sale, all are postpaid.  Accepting PayPal F&F, checks or MO.  PayPal F&F payment to [url]JSRNA@AOL.com[/url], please contact me before sending payment to verify the item is still available.



1958 Boston Red Sox team issued real photo postcard includes Ted Williams (top row, far right). Devolite back, unused, no creases.  $60.00

C1910 Chicago Cubs West Side Park, advertising card for Cubs tickets through Spalding & Bros. stores.  Unused, corner wear, no creases, nice item.  $200.00

1915 Salt Lake Bees team picture and ball grounds, Majestic Park, good Pacific Coast League team, many MLB players on the roster.  Used, corner wear, crease bottom right corner. $100.00
